athena:
Bjetslice, ttbar, run2 chains BjetSlice, ttbar, run2 chains EventMax=2000; TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_BjetSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long
# include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_bjet_sample2.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-bjet.root -b Test_bin.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-bjet.root data-bjet-5200-reference.root EF_b55_NoCut_j55_a4tchad_InDetTrigParticleCreation_Bjet_EFID -d EF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-bjet.root data-bjet-5200-reference.root L2_b50_NoCut_j50_c4cchad_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Jet_0 L2_b50_NoCut_j50_c4cchad_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Jet_1 L2_b50_NoCut_j50_c4cchad_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Jet_2 L2_b50_NoCut_j50_c4cchad_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Jet_3 -d L2-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-bjet.root data-bjet-reference-newchains.root HLT_j55_bperf_TrigFastTrackFinder_Jet HLT_j55_bperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Bjet_EFID HLT_j55_EFID_bperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Bjet_EFID -d HLTEF-plots
# include "TrigInDetValidation_expertMonitoring.xml" # include "TrigInDetValidation_costMonitoring.xml"
RTT:Top CheckFileRunner0
TIDAdata*.dat data-bjet-5200-reference.root data-bjet-reference-newchains.root expert-monitoring-bjet_run2-ref.root # include "TrigInDetValidation_aux.xml" Test_bin.dat
